panels.description: Average requests per second over the time range
panels.title: Avg Throughtput

panels.description: Numer of request per second received
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Number of bytes sent in the body responses
panels.title: Data Sent

panels.description: Numer of request per second received
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Number of bytes sent in the body responses
panels.title: Data Sent

panels.description: Total amount of data sent per endpoint
panels.title: Data Sent

targets.expr: bottomk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(http_server_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", url_path!=""}[$__range])))) >= 0
topk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(http_server_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", url_path!=""}[$__range])))) >= 0

panels.description: Numer of request per second received
panels.title: Throughput

targets.expr: bottomk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(krakend_pipe_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", url_path=~"$endpoint"}[$__range])))) >= 0
topk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(http_server_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", url_path=~"$endpoint", url_path!=""}[$__range])))) >= 0

panels.description: Number of BACKEND request per second executed
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Time it takes for a request to have the firsta byte of the response body ready to be readed.
panels.title: 95p Backend Request Duration

panels.description: Number of bytes reported by consumed responses Content-Length values. In case of chunked responses, the metrics are not displayed here.
panels.title: Received Content Length

panels.description: Average response content-lenght. Chunked responses are not taken into account.
panels.title: Average Content Length

panels.description: Number of bytes readed from the body. In case a cancel, or a closed connection, the read bytes might not match those of content-lenght. This metric includes chunked responses that do not come with the Content-Length header set.
panels.title: Read Content Size

panels.description: Average Number of bytes readed from the body. In case a cancel, or a closed connection, the read bytes might not match those of content-lenght. This metric includes chunked responses that do not come with the Content-Length header set.
panels.title: Avg Read Content Size

targets.expr: bottomk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(http_client_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", krakend_endpoint=~"$endpoint", url_path!=""}[$__range])))) >= 0
topk($max_list, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, url_path) (rate(http_client_duration_bucket{instance=~"$instance", krakend_endopoint=~"$endpoint", url_path!=""}[$__range])))) >= 0
sum by (http_request_method_original, krakend_endpoint, server_address, url_path) (rate(http_client_requests_started_count_total{instance=~"$instance", url_path=~"$endpoint"}[1m]))

list.description: The Instance that we want to monitor
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: The granularity of the time interval
list.name: interval

list.description: Number of elements to display in lists, like top N, or bottom N
list.name: max_list
